events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on a rainy day, causing significant front-end damage to their vehicle.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the insured's vehicle and collision details.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to assist the customer with further claim processing and documentation.
The customer received confirmation from the insurance provider acknowledging receipt of the accident claim.
Request sent to customer for submitting the accident report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and police report for verification.
Customer uploaded all required documents including the police report and multiple detailed photos showing the vehicle damage.
The claim investigation commenced, focusing on verifying the accident details and damage severity through assigned inspectors.
Inspection report completed confirming the extent of damage aligns with accident description and liability assessment.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering the repair costs and rental car reimbursement during the repair period.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal, appreciating quick response and fair compensation offered.
The claim has been officially approved after customer consent to the proposed settlement terms.
The insurance payment covering car repairs and rental allowance was processed and transferred to the customer's account.
With payment issued and no further queries from the customer, the claim case was successfully closed.
